instructionRoom: Please fill out the form below to request an <1>openly accessible</1> and <3>public</3> room … <5>you don’t have to request private rooms, you can create them.</5>
instructionAcc: Please fill out the form below to request a temporary <1>external</1> account … <3>this is only necessary for people without an @udk-berlin.de account.</3>

form.name: your name
form.roomPlaceholder: i.e. the name of your class or course
form.accountPlaceholder: first and last names, seperated by commas
form.notesPlaceholderAcc: first and last names, seperated by commas
form.alertSuccess: Your request has ben sent! We will get back to you asap!
form.alertFail: Couldn't send your message. Please check your internet connection
